error: Well, that wasn't supposed to happen...
Oh no, a glitch in the matrix!
Huh... that wasn't part of the script.
Looks like we've encountered a little hiccup.
noLyrics: The lyrical elves are still searching for the words to this tune.
Seems like the lyrics for this track are playing hide and seek.
This song is being a bit shy with its lyrics at the moment.
shuffleQueue: Shake it up! The rythm just took an exciting twist
Shuffle complete! The playlist is now dancing to a new tune.
skipTrack: Skipping ahead to the next musical gem!
removeTrack: Poof! And the track vanished from the queue.
And just like that, the track disappeared from the queue.
clearQueue: Playlist wiped clean. It's a fresh start!
Clean slate! The stage is set for new beats.
pauseTrack: Hold tight, the track's on pause.
resumeTrack: Time to pick up where we left off!
